column4: I tried Gentoo, and found it to be the crashiest Linux I had tried. I tried Fedora, and found it to be the bloatiest Linux I had tried. I used slackware for a very long time and it was perfect, but not easy. Ubuntu is a shiny Debian, and I love it.
Slackware will teach you how to *use linux*.
yes. It will have OSX on it for an hour after I buy it.
